page.title: 07LEISURE ACTIVITIES(2)
page.content: Many young people are members of the local{Young Farmers Club}which holds activities in the area. The village has a{Silver Band}which plays for many local functions and has travelled to Germany as part of the twinning association of nearby Bicester. There is an active{Old Peoples {Committee}which organises an annual Turkey roast and other activities to raise money to provide outings and amenities for old people in the area. There is a{bell ringing group}attached to St.Mary's Church. The school has an active{P.T.A.}which organises social and fund raising events. There is also a{Mothers and Toddlers group and a{Playgroup}which meets in Marsh Gibbon Village Hall.
